description: The Ninja, in two matches has an impressive power score (234) however that is only with two opponents. The dragon has a power rating of 101 and has faced some tough opponents. The ninja with only 5 shame points, takes on Dragon who has 144 style point to her credit. Who losses and has to suck the cock of the winner in round 4? This time I do remember.
title: The Ninja (2-0) vs. the Dragon (4-1).
